fines_method_details: hydrometer-plus-pipette.... ASTM 152H-type (g/L) followed by centrifuge and Lowry sampling for <0.2 micron fraction
sample passed through #270 sieve; no separations made below this size
laser scattering; suspension tested with Malvern Panalytical Mastersizer 3000 instrument. Obscuration was 5-15%. Termed 'laser-diffraction' in method abbreviation.
